## Slide with Folding Code

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| code-fold: true
mtcars |> 
  group_by(cyl) |> 
  summarize(mean_mpg = mean(mpg),
            median_mpg = median(mpg))
```


## Inline Code

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| code-fold: true
mpg_stats = mtcars |> 
  summarize(min_mpg = min(mpg),
            mean_mpg = mean(mpg),
            median_mpg = median(mpg),
            max_mpg = max(mpg))
```

Miles per gallon (`mpg`) statistics

- Min: `r pull(mpg_stats, min_mpg)`

- Mean: `r pull(mpg_stats, mean_mpg)`

- Median: `r pull(mpg_stats, median_mpg)`

- Max: `r pull(mpg_stats, max_mpg)`


## Plot

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| code-fold: true
mtcars |> 
  mutate(cylinders = factor(cyl)) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = cylinders)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(title = "Distribution of Number of Cylinders")
```
